name: Whole Wheat Banana Oat Muffins
author: rwodatch
summary: Relatively healthy muffins! Moist and tasty!
ingredients: ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon, or more to taste
¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg, or more to taste
1 cup walnuts, crushed using a rolling pin
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a muffin tin with paper liners
Combine oats, whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, white sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a medium-sized bowl
Lightly beat eggs in a large bowl
Stir in milk, oil, brown sugar, and vanilla extract
Add bananas and mix together well
Add 1/2 the flour mixture and stir to combine
Add remaining flour mixture and stir
Spoon batter into the prepared muffin cups, filling each 3/4 full
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center of a muffin comes out clean, 18 to 20 minutes
